title: Collected Plays: Taledanda, The Fire and the Rain, The Dreams of Tipu Sultan, Flowers and Images: Two Dramatic Monologues, Volume 2
description: This book is the second volume of a collection of plays by Girish Karnad, one of India's foremost dramatists and actors. It contains Taledanda , The Fire and the Rain , The Dreams of Tipu Sultan , and Macaulay's Children .
author: Girish Karnad
